ygData.subject: Re: rts and skull of jhen tra
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I understand, this is a rumor started when people realized the Priest of Discord had a staff with a skull on it. Jumdar ... From: jannus_@hotmail.com
ygData.messageBody:
From what I understand, this is a rumor started when people realized the Priest of Discord had a staff with a skull on it.

Jumdar

-----Original Message-----
From: jannus_@... [mailto:jannus_@...]
Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 3:21 PM
To: everquest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen tra


From: "Jannus Malus" <jannus_@...>

I've heard that the runed totem staff and skull of jhen tra can be used
together/in conjunction with each other, yet there is no obvious way to do
this. Is this information wrong, or am I just missing something? Thanks in
advance.
Jannus
